title: Tokenized Fund Adoption Grows but Brings Technology Risks: Moody's
description: Entities providing tokenization tech have a limited track record and may contribute to increased risk, a new report by analysts at the credit-rating agency says.

title: Crypto Trader Who Accurately Called Bitcoin’s 2022 Market Bottom Says Bitcoin Is Headed to $60K
description: A prominent figure in the cryptocurrency trading community, known for accurately predicting the 2022 market bottom of Bitcoin, has now presented a detailed forecast suggesting a significant rise in Bitcoin’s value. title: Paolo Ardoino Confirms Bitfinex Foiled Major Exploit Attempt
description: Cryptocurrency exchange Bitfinex has revealed it has successfully repelled an attempt to exploit $15 billion worth of XRP tokens on the platform that were associated with an attempt using an unsuccessful partial payments exploit.

title: Global Economy Faces Uncertain Year Ahead, Davos Survey Reveals
description: The global economy is poised for a challenging year, characterized by subdued growth prospects and a cloud of uncertainty, according to a recent survey of over 60 chief economists from the private and public sectors worldwide. Conducted annually ahead of the World Economic Forum’s (WEF) gathering in Davos, Switzerland, this survey provides insights into the […]

title: Impact of Artificial Intelligence on Global Jobs: IMF Warns of Significant Changes
description: In a recent report, the International Monetary Fund (IMF) has issued a stark warning about the potential consequences of the increasing influence of artificial intelligence (AI) on the global job market. The IMF predicts that AI could disrupt up to 40% of jobs across the world, with advanced economies like the UK facing an even […]

title: Renewed interest in DeFi and stablecoins expected as Federal Reserve considers interest rate cut
description: A recent report released by asset manager Fidelity stated that an anticipated interest rate cut by the Federal Reserve in the United States could rekindle the interest of major institutions in decentralized finance (DeFi) and stablecoins. However, this renewed interest hinges on the further development of the infrastructure in the DeFi space this year. Fidelity […]

title: Celsius moves $125m in ETH to exchanges amid plan to repay creditors

title: VeChain and BCG: Revolutionizing Sustainability with Blockchain
description: VeChain and Boston Consulting Group (BCG) are collaborating to pioneer sustainable blockchain solutions, with a spotlight on their partnership at The World Economic Forum’s Annual Meeting 2024 in Davos, Switzerland.
